spec_data.Name: perl-Modern-Perl
spec_data.Description:
Modern Perl often relies on the presence of several core and CPAN pragmas
and modules.  Wouldn't it be nice to use them all with a single command?
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 01:20:49 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Enable all of the features of Modern Perl with one command
